summary: This cable discusses a plan to establish a clandestine radio station in Mexico, named "RADIO CUBA LIBRE," to communicate with a sabotage team in Cuba. LITAMIL-5 is tasked with contacting LIOOZE-1 in Havana and delivering a code book to "JESUS BADAL," who is in contact with KUBARK PBPRIME. The radio transmitter was received as a gift, and LITAMIL-5's voice will be used for the broadcasts.
title: MEXI 8621: JMZIP RYBAT - BARBOSA Tomar
